title: War Front: Turning Point Review
description:
War Front Turning Point is an alternate history World War 2 RTS game where the Germans have mechs, the Allies have forcefields, and the Soviet Union has mastered ABV necromancy.
Video artwork by @sneksucks 
Support the channel at: https://www.patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/mandaloregaming
I take video suggestions at mandaloremovies@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lord_Mandalore

00:15 - Background
02:20 - Game Premise
05:02 - Visuals
09:40 - Music & Sound Design
12:08 - Gameplay Mechanics
24:20 - The Campaigns (Story)
42:46 - Conclusions
43:25 - Credits
44:34 - I Need a Big Hans
